```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```


```{r cars}
data <- cars
summary(cars)
plot(cars)
```

## Including Plots
```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
data2 <- pressure
head(data2)
lm(data2, formula = pressure ~ temperature)

# this is a base function (no external library needed)
hist(data2$temperature, col = "lightblue", border = "pink")

# this is using ggplot2 library (does not work if ggplot2 is not loaded)
ggplot(data=data2, aes(x=temperature, y=pressure)) + geom_point() + geom_line() 

```
